summary: Comprehensive testing of KB CMS feature - Backend 100% pass (30/30 tests), Frontend functional with minor UI issues

fixed.issue: KeyError: 'id' when iterating subcategories - MongoDB stores as _id not id
fixed.fix: Changed s['id'] to s.get('_id', s.get('id')) in kb_routes.py line 138

ui_bugs.issue: Wrong import paths for UI components (../ui/ instead of ../../components/ui/)
Wrong import for @tiptap/extension-table - used default import instead of named import
ui_bugs.fix: Changed to named imports: { Table }, { TableRow }, { TableCell }, { TableHeader }

critical_code_review_comments: MongoDB _id handling is inconsistent across kb_routes.py - some places use .get('_id', .get('id')) while others use direct access
Consider standardizing the _id to id conversion in a helper function to avoid future KeyError issues
seed_data_creation: Created 'Getting Started' category with 'Installation Guide' subcategory for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: KB CMS is fully functional. Admin can login, create categories/subcategories/articles. Public KB pages display categories and search works. All backend APIs tested and passing. Test admin credentials: testadmin/testpass123

frontend_pages: /kb/admin/articles/new - Article editor with Tiptap rich text
